string.value: What does it mean to be a Magician? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bMagicianr#k if you're at least #bLevel 8#k. He tells you to see #rGrendel the Really Old#k in #rEllinia#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Magician from the chief of all wizards, Grendel the Really Old. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.
#b#p1032001##k, the greatest Magician... I have never seen him up close. Someone told me he's always at the Magic Library, reading. So do you want to become a Magician?
Okay. Give #b#p1032001##k my greetings. Perhaps I'll get to meet him one day. Anyway, to become a Magician, head to Ellinia and go to the Magic Library located at the very top of that area.
Passing by me and go further, you can find #bMagician Statue#k to teleport to #bElinia#k.
You don't think being a Magician suits you? Seems all right to me... In any case, talk to me when you're ready to choose a path.
Are you here to become a Magician like me?
Many come, hoping to be great Magicians. They push themselves hard. If you wish to join them, you need to be at least #bLevel 8#k. Talk to me when you're ready.
At the very top of the biggest tree in the biggest forest of Victoria Island, a place called #rEllnia#k, you'll find #b#p1032001##k.
